City Council
============

**The Victoria City Council meets on the first and third Tuesday of each month at 5 p.m. Council meetings are held in the council chambers at the corner of Juan Linn and Main Street.**

![Group photo of City Council members with Mayor Duane Crocker](https://www.victoriatx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=14133)

* [Duane Crocker, **Mayor**  
  Elected 2024; Term Expires 2028](https://www.victoriatx.gov/725/Mayor---Duane-Crocker)
* [Rafael DeLaGarza, III, **District 1**  
  Elected 2016; Term Expires 2027](https://www.victoriatx.gov/723/District-1---Rafael-DeLaGarza-III)
* [Steven Kidder, **District 2**  
  Elected 2024; Term Expires 2027](https://www.victoriatx.gov/724/District-2Mayor-Pro-Tem---Josephine-Soli)
* [April L. Butler,**District 3**   
  Elected 2024; Term Expires 2027](https://www.victoriatx.gov/966/District-3---Vacant)

* [Jan Scott, **District 4**  
  Elected 2015; Term Expires 2027](https://www.victoriatx.gov/726/District-4---Jan-Scott)
* [Dr. Andrew Young, **Super District 5/**](https://www.victoriatx.gov/727/Super-District-5---Dr-Andrew-Young)[**Mayor Pro-Tem**  
  Elected 2013; Term Expires 2028](https://www.victoriatx.gov/727/Super-District-5---Dr-Andrew-Young)
* [Mark Loffgren, **Super District 6**  
  Elected 2019; Term Expires 2028](https://www.victoriatx.gov/728/Super-District-6---Mark-Loffgren)
